def calculate_difference(samantha_cards, perry_cards, cards_transferred):
    samantha_end = samantha_cards + cards_transferred
    perry_end = perry_cards + cards_transferred
    difference = samantha_end - perry_end
    return difference

    perry_end = perry_cards + cards_transferred
    difference = samantha_end - perry_end
    return difference
